definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我這位熟人證明，他的同事們既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: that it's okay to not do great in studio, but you can still succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在工作室學習不太好不要緊，你依然能成功。

sentences.english: The quality of reproduction isn't very good on this recording.
sentences.chinese: 這錄音的複製質量不太好。

sentences.english: Angela:I don't think this is good for me. I think I need to go on a diet.
sentences.chinese: 但我覺得這樣好像不太好耶，我想我應該要減肥了。

sentences.english: I was born in South East London in a not very nice place.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在倫敦東南區一個不太好的地方。

sentences.english: Luan: It's not a very nice term, but yes, it's true.
sentences.chinese: 這樣稱呼並不太好聽，但是，確實如此。

sentences.english: He has bad teeth, and can only eat diced food.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒不太好，要將東西臠割後才能食用。

sentences.english: "We had a gearbox problem, the car was not doing well when I was running, " Barrichello explained to BBC Sport.
sentences.chinese: 我們的變速箱有點問題，我跑的時候賽車表現不太好。

sentences.english: Just as well. I hear it isn't good.
sentences.chinese: 無所謂，我聽說那齣戲不太好看。

sentences.english: Who says Beijing dialect differences with Mandarin is not a good example to distinguish between southerners?
sentences.chinese: 誰說北京話與普通話的差異對南方人來說不太好分辨？

sentences.english: 'I'm not in very good condition,' he answered.
sentences.chinese: ‘我現在身體狀況不太好，’他回答說。

sentences.english: My ears ain’t good these days.
sentences.chinese: 我的耳朵這些天不太好使。

sentences.english: And, oddly enough, it was given a bad name.
sentences.chinese: 說來也奇怪，它的名字不太好。

sentences.english: The acoustics are not very good, I have trouble understanding some bit.
sentences.chinese: 音響效果不太好，有些地方我聽不太清。

sentences.english: Tom can play the guitar but he cant play is very well.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆會彈吉他，但他彈的不太好。

sentences.english: I speak a little bit of everything, but none of them is very good.
sentences.chinese: 我什麼話都會講一點兒，可是講得都不太好。

definition: not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
a good deal of/quite a lot
